sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the P-20 Longitudinal Education Data System Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the P-20 Longitudinal Education Data System Act.

sections.heading: Findings; declarations.   The General Assembly finds and declares all of the following:
sections.text: Findings; declarations. The General Assembly finds and declares all of the following:

sections.heading: Establishment of the longitudinal data system and data warehouse.
sections.text: Establishment of the longitudinal data system and data warehouse.

sections.heading: Subject to privacy protection laws
sections.text: The collection, use, maintenance, disclosure, and sharing of data authorized by this Act must be conducted in accordance with privacy protection laws. The State Education Authorities shall each develop security measures and procedures that protect personal info

sections.heading: No impact on existing authority
sections.text: This Act does not modify or diminish any responsibilities or authority that a State Education Authority or the State Education Authorities collectively may otherwise have under law with respect to the collection, use, maintenance, disclosure, and sharing of data.

sections.heading: Evaluation. Subject to the availability of funding through appropriations made specifically for the purposes of this Act, the State Education Authorities shall contract with an independent outside evaluator for oversight of the development and operation of the longitudinal data system
Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
